Bione aims to make and support scientific discoveries in the area of Genetic and Gut Microbiome for human health and welfare. Some of these discoveries will be published in scientific journals to spread the scientific knowledge at global level for the benefit of humankind. We invite you to take part in this project, which we call Bione MyMicroBiome and Genetic Research Study and to participate you must agree to the research consent described below:

Your personal information will not be used for research and your MyMicrobiome & Genetic data will be de-identified

Your de-identified MyMicroBiome and Genetic data and any other personal information provided by you may be analyzed in the research.

Bione researchers who conduct analyses will have access to your de-identified MyMicrobiome and Genetic data.

Your leftover sample can also be used in study and will be securely stored until study will be completed. Study data generated by Bione will be kept indefinitely in a secured cloud server. Bione privacy statement outlines no one gets access to the personal information of Bione customers.

Bione MyMicroBiome and Genetic Research Study is non-commercial and sometime in the future you or your family and as well as society may benefit indirectly from research discoveries made by Bione.

The decision to participate in this study is voluntary

If Yes, it indicates that you have decided to allow your de-identified sample and data in Bione MyMicroBiome and Genetic Research Study

If No, it indicates that you have decided to opt out yourself from voluntary participation in scientific research in such case your leftover sample and de-identified data will not be used for the Bione MyMicroBiome and Genetic Research Study.

I hereby declare that from the past 14 days (from date of saliva sample collection), I am not suffering from symptoms (Fever, cough, shortness of breath, breathing difficulties & pneumonia) which can be related to coronavirus infection.

Bioneâ€™s LongiFIT is designed to help you achieve your true fitness goals and make them truly personal by knowing what impacts your body, backed by science.

A DNA test that can be taken in the comfort of your home can reveal gene mutations which can increase your risk for diseases like diabetes, obesity, Alzheimerâ€™s and cardiovascular conditions. Based on the report and free counselling sessions with our experts, you can make smarter lifestyle choices to prevent such diseases and achieve optimal health.

Improve your overall lifestyle and optimize your life by using insights backed by science

Every individual has its own unique gut microbiota profile that plays many specific functions in host nutrient metabolism, maintenance of structural integrity of the gut mucosal barrier, immuno-modulation, and protection against pathogens. Composition of gut microbiome is defined into 4 major groups of microorganisms Bacteria, Archaea, Virus and Eukaryota (Fungi, Protozoa and Metazoa). The dominant gut microbial phyla are Firmicutes, Bacteroidetes, Actinobacteria, Proteobacteria, Fusobacteria, and Verrucomicrobia Each humanâ€™s gut healthy core microbiota remains relatively stable in adulthood but differs between individuals due to enterotypes, Body Mass Index (BMI) level, exercise frequency, lifestyle, and cultural and dietary habits. Indeed, dysbiosis of gut microbiota is associated not only with intestinal disorders but also with numerous extra-intestinal diseases such as metabolic and neurological disorders.
